price: 10. Marka laga reebo mid mid dafa (hadal uu ka maqlay samada), markaasaa waxaa laga daba geeyaa danab ifi.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ خَطِفَ ٱلۡخَطۡفَةَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ ثَاقِبٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā man khaṭifa al-khaṭfata fa-atbaʿahu shihābun thāqibun
